channel.title: Adding My own very serverstatus page?
channel.description:
REMOVE THE OTHER 1 BECAUSE I HAVE GOTTEN SOME THINGS DONE SINCE THEN
hey i was wondering how i would add my own serverstatus page onto my website..what ive done:
Bought hosting created mySQL database hmmm.. thats pretty much it.
